title: Tensed Up….
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>….Phew<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ooh~, amazing, Umi-chan, you hit all of the targets<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you very much. The term for hitting all of the targets is “Kaichuu”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>So it’s called Kaichuu, huh. Hmm hmm<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Kanata, do you have an interest in archery? If so, perhaps I could teach you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah, it seems fun! But, actually…. The first thing that interested Kanata was the quietness of the archery range~. Kanata thought it would be a nice place to take a nap in….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>A nap!? I won’t allow such an act in this sacred dojo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>K-, Kanata gets it~! Watching archery makes Kanata’s back tense up, so~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….It seems that you understand the depth of archery, Kanata. Would you like to try for a little bit?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>No. Kanata would rather watch Umi-chan from behind….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You don’t have to be shy. Come on, you can go here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Uu, actually…. Kanata’s legs are…. Numb and can’t really move…. Umi-chan, don’t ever ever touch Kanata right now….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….Fufu, it happens a lot. Let me help you get rid of the numbness♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Stop-! Stop-! Don’t touch Kanata--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
